Sentence.sentence: So, it is argued, stripping cartons of their branding will trigger no mass movement to quit.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Scientists have devised a way to determine roughly where a person has lived using a strand of hair, a technique that could help track the movements of criminal suspects or unidentified murdervictims.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Experts see a movement toward the use of mobile technology in education, though they say it is in its infancy as professors try to come up with useful applications.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Critics of the home schooling movement content that it creates as many problems as it solves.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Chaos theory was developed by scientists, trying to explain the movement of the planets and the changes in environmental conditions
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But do economics and finance work in the same way as weather conditions or the movement of planets
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: An international movement was launched to promote its use.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite arguments and disagreements, the movement has continued to flourish and has members in more than 80 countries
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What is said about the international movement to promote the use of Esperanto?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As the ocean warms, a body of water called the Antarctic Polar Front - an upward movement of nutrient-rich sea that supports a huge abundance of marine life - is being pushed further south. This means that king penguins, which feed on fish and krill in th
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It is a movement building steady momentua call to make research data, software code and experimental methods publicly available and transparent.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Movement out of city centers was widespread, and downtown tenants were predominantly made up of the working poor.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The low-carbohydrate food movement gave birth to such diets as the Atkins, Paleo and Keto, which advised swapping foods like bread, pasta and potatoes for vegetables, fish and meat.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: They were able to accurately place the hair samples in broad regions roughly corresponding to the movement of rain systems.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"运动"之意。
means: motion ： 指不处于静止状态而在移动的过程中，强调运动本身，而不涉及其动因。
move ： 着重开始的行动或变化。
movement ： 通常抽象地指有规则的动作或定向运动，特指政治性的运动。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]

Sentence.sentence: Because of changes to methods of working, new designs allow for expansion or movement of desks, storage, and equipment within the workstation.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 选词填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Body movements change the way people think.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: Both the hand movements and the very idea of communicating without speaking attracted me.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Business people, political leaders, university professors, and especially millions of grass-roots Americans are taking part in the movement.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But the disease is making a comeback, caused by a growing anti-vaccine movement and misinformation that is spreading quickly.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: But what began as nothing important in public affairs has grown into a social movement.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: If it weren't for Rachel Carson, the environmental movement might not exist today.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It lasted for more than a year, and kicked off the civil-rights movement.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's surprising how much simple movements of the body can affect the way we think.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: My goal was to lose 150 pounds in one year and raise $50,000 in support of a movement founded 30 years ago to end hunger.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is not by chance that the Funeral March is not the last movement of the Eroica Symphony, but the second, so that suffering does not have the last word.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: This movement, driven by powerful and diverse motivations, built a nation out of a wilderness and, by its nature, shaped the character and destiny of an uncharted continent.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研翻译原文

means.word_mean: 移动; 运动; 活动

sentences.en: Downward movement is much faster than upward one.
sentences.cn: 向下移动比向上移动快得多。

sentences.en: We were amused at his funny movements in doing morning exercises.
sentences.cn: 他做早操时的滑稽动作使我们觉得好笑。

sentences.en: Troop movements can be observed from space by a satellite.
sentences.cn: 借助卫星可以观察到部队的调动。

means.word_mean: 动向, 趋向, 倾向

sentences.en: He could not yet tell where the movement of his thought would take him.
sentences.cn: 他还不敢说他的思想发展趋势会把他引向何方。

means.word_mean: 运动, 开展运动的团体

sentences.en: The trade union movement is[are] concerned with working conditions.
sentences.cn: 工会运动关注工作条件。

sentences.en: This is a beautiful movement.
sentences.cn: 这是一篇优美的乐章。

data.mean: （具有共同思想或目标的）运动

sentence.cn: 但是由于越来越多的反疫苗运动和快速传播的错误信息，这种疾病正在卷土重来。
sentence.en: But the disease is making a comeback,  caused by a growing anti-vaccine movement and misinformation that is spreading quickly.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

sentence.cn: 由于工作方式的变化，新设计允许扩展或移动办公桌，存储设备和使用工作站内的设备。
sentence.en: Because of changes to methods of working,  new designs allow for expansion or movement of desks,  storage, and equipment within the workstation.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语上海卷 选词填空 原文

entry.def: A movement is a group of people who share the same beliefs, ideas, or aims.
entry.tran: (拥有共同信仰、思想或目标的)运动，运动团体

example.ex: It's part of a broader Hindu nationalist movement that's gaining strength throughout the country.
example.tran: 这是一场凝聚全国力量的更大规模的印度教民族主义运动的一部分。

entry.def: Movement involves changing position or going from one place to another.

example.ex: They actually monitor the movement of the fish going up river.
example.tran: 他们实际上在监测鱼类迁往上游的活动。

example.ex: ...the plan for free movement of people, goods, capital and services across internal Community borders...
example.tran: 劳动力、货物、资本和服务在共同体各成员国间自由流动的计划

entry.def: A movement is a planned change in position that an army makes during a battle or military exercise.
entry.tran: (军队作战或演习时的)调遣，调动

example.ex: There are reports of fresh troop movements across the border.
example.tran: 有报告说，新近有军队越过边境。

entry.def: Movement is a gradual development or change of an attitude, opinion, or policy.
entry.tran: (态度、观点、政策等的)逐渐变化，趋势，动向

example.ex: ...the movement towards democracy in Latin America...
There was a very good atmosphere at the talks and the participants believed movement forward was possible.
example.tran: 会谈气氛非常融洽，与会者相信会取得进展。

entry.def: Your movements are everything which you do or plan to do during a period of time.
entry.tran: (某人在某一时期内的)行动，活动，动向

example.ex: I want a full account of your movements the night Mr Gower was killed.
example.tran: 请你完整地描述一下高尔先生被杀的那天晚上你的一切行踪。

entry.def: A movement of a piece of classical music is one of its main sections.

example.tran: 贝多芬《第七交响曲》第一乐章

means.word_mean: 1. a change of position that does not entail a change of location;

sentences.sentence: "the reflex motion of his eyebrows revealed his surprise"
"movement is a sign of life"
"an impatient move of his hand"
"gastrointestinal motility"

means.word_mean: 2. a natural event that involves a change in the position or location of something
3. the act of changing location from one place to another;

sentences.sentence: "police controlled the motion of the crowd"
"the movement of people from the farms to the cities"
"his move put him directly in my path"

means.word_mean: 4. a group of people with a common ideology who try together to achieve certain general goals;

sentences.sentence: "he was a charter member of the movement"
"politicians have to respect a mass movement"
"he led the national liberation front"

means.word_mean: 5. a major self-contained part of a symphony or sonata;

sentences.sentence: "the second movement is slow and melodic"

means.word_mean: 6. a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end;

sentences.sentence: "he supported populist campaigns"
"they worked in the cause of world peace"
"the team was ready for a drive toward the pennant"
"the movement to end slavery"
"contributed to the war effort"

means.word_mean: 7. an optical illusion of motion produced by viewing a rapid succession of still pictures of a moving object;

sentences.sentence: "the cinema relies on apparent motion"
"the succession of flashing lights gave an illusion of movement"
"he had a bowel movement"

means.word_mean: 9. a general tendency to change (as of opinion);

sentences.sentence: "not openly liberal but that is the trend of the book"
"a broad movement of the electorate to the right"

means.word_mean: 10. the driving and regulating parts of a mechanism (as of a watch or clock);

sentences.sentence: "it was an expensive watch with a diamond movement"

means.word_mean: 11. the act of changing the location of something;

sentences.sentence: "the movement of cargo onto the vessel"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin movimentum, from Latin movere 'to move'

sentences.cn: 肌肉的表现还会受到一种被称为“中枢性疲劳”的(27) 现象影响，发生这种现象时，体内化学传递物质的失衡会阻碍中枢神经系统(28) 有效地指挥肌肉运动。

sentences.cn: 研究团队发现，锻炼使快速眼球运动的速度下降了大约8%，(33) 阻碍了眼睛捕捉新的视觉信息。

sentences.cn: 咖啡因——相当于两杯浓咖啡的量——(34) 足以逆转这个效果，有些骑车者甚至显现出(35) 更快的眼球运动速度。
sentences.en: The caffeine—the equivalent of two strong cups of coffee,was 34 sufficient to reverse this effect, with some cyclists even displaying 35 increased eye movement speeds.
